argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | scmatstrbas.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | scmatstrbas.c | |- C = ( N ScMat R ) |
| 3 |  | scmatstrbas.s | |- S = ( A |`s C ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` A ) = ( Base ` A ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` R ) = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 7 | 1, 4, 5, 6, 2 | #P_scmatsrng | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> C e. ( SubRing ` A ) ) |
| 8 | 3 | #P_subrgbas | |- ( C e. ( SubRing ` A ) -> C = ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( C e. ( SubRing ` A ) -> ( Base ` S ) = C ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( Base ` S ) = C ) |
